Description:
Position Title:             Projects ExecutiveEmployment Type:     Full Time  Salary:                        up to 6K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Dubai, UAE  About the Client:  A well-established logistics expert company based in Dubai, offering comprehensive all-in-one solutions  Job Description:  Prepare timely quotations and invoices for client billing.
Coordinate cargo collection with client's suppliers and arrange suitable shipment options.
Follow up with overseas offices for freight rates, booking, and shipment updates.
Activate shipments and prepare necessary shipping documents, including import and export permits for customs declarations.
Monitor shipment status daily, provide regular updates to relevant stakeholders, attend client's shipment status meetings, coordinate tender preparations with local and overseas offices, and prepare internal project costs and monthly profit and loss reports per shipment.Skills
Skills:
40 years old and below
At least 2 years related experience in freight forwarding company within UAE
Must have full knowledge in projects coordination in freight forwarding
Must have a typing speed of nearly 40 WPM
